review: Dr. Noorie Abdul Salam is very patient and explains the issue/steps very clearly. She takes efforts to make you as comfortable as possible, while ensuring that there are no shortcuts on treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Noorie made my re-root canal experience wonderful. She was patient, professional, and explained everything clearly. The procedure was quick, painless, and expertly done, showcasing her expertise and integrity. I highly recommend her as a trustworthy and friendly dentist.
